item.title: Simple autominer what drops ores
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

Here it is, save as GraniteMiner.java in your scripts folder and compile by clicking on"Compile-Scripts.bat".
Start the script with the run code: /graniteMiner()
(btw, change the 0000 at “private int ID_GRANITE = 0000;” to the id of the granite, how to do it:
right click on the mined granite and you will see some codes, use the 4/5 digit code.
Example: if you get (1234) (9876,1928) then use the code 1234.

[code]/**

  • Pimjong Granite Miner
  • Mines Granite
  • And when inventory is full
  • it drops the ore!
    **/

public class GraniteMiner extends Script
{

public static String[] commands = { “graniteMiner” };
private int ID_PICK = 1265; //this is for bronze pick, cange if you use a other pickaxe
private int ID_GRANITE = 0000; //Change the “0000” to the id of the granite, right click and insert the 4/5 digit code
private int OBJ_GRANITE = 10947;

public boolean start(String cmd, String[] args) {
if(inventoryCount(1265) < 1) {
log(“How do you think i can mine without a pickaxe?!”);
log(“Goodbye, get a pickaxe before you start!”);
return false;
} else {
System.out.println(“STARTING GRANITE MINER”);
System.out.println(“MADE BY PIMJONG”);
return true;
}
}

public long run(long lastExecution) {
if(inventoryCount() == 28) {
dropItem(ID_GRANITE,27);
return 1000;
}
int graniteUID = findObject(10947);
if(graniteUID == -1) {
} else {
atObject(graniteUID,1);
}
return 1000;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
